notes.text: OP: Enabled table toolbar button on an object page
LROP : Used aria-haspopup (Aria 1.1) for better accessibility
Enabled passing of multi contexts in external navigation without any parameters
OP: Provided an option to retrieve descriptive texts for SmartFields in Display mode from the resource path mentioned in ValueList annotation
ALP: Merged user default filters with standard variant defaults from vendor layer
Provide a meaningful e-Tag message
Removed properties marked with annotations UI.ExcludeFromNavigationContext or PersonalData.IsPotentiallySensitive from the navigation context when navigating through a smart link
ALP: Support provided for parameter based visual filters
ALP: ariaHasPopup updated with multiple changes
ALP: Calls are postponed from value list compact filter drop-down
ALP: Visual filter dropdown now supports In Parameters.
Clubbed header calls while editing drafts
Ignore passing blank values in SV while navigating to external app
Altered response structure for custom action
Fixed safety net issue caused due to undefined technical details in messages
OP: Re-added tolerance for wrong annotations
LR: Refactored code for TextArrangement visibility changes in a table
Updated TextArrangement visibility in list report tables
LROP: New check added for column header during popup display is not available for DataFieldForIntentBasedNavigation and DataFieldForAction
OP: Fallback possible to read settings defined for a section
LR: Table is not blurred when adapt filter dialog is cancelled
ALP: Set Smartchart height to 50vH
LR: Re-enabled 'Execute on Select' with user default values
OP: Fixed horizontal alignment issue of chart title in the header section
